effect.hacksawed.bleeding.desc:
Deals damage every second, getting twice as fast every level.
At a high enough duration, the level increases, and the duration gets shortened accordingly.
effect.hacksawed.bleeding.description:
Deals damage every second, getting twice as fast every level.
At a high enough duration, the level increases, and the duration gets shortened accordingly.
death.attack.bleeding.item: %s bled to death whilst trying to escape %s and their %s
death.attack.bleeding.player: %s bled to death whilst trying to escape %s
hacksawed.midnightconfig.title: Hacksawed Configs
Toggles the recipe for the Hacksaw, requires reload.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.bleedingAmplifi: Amount of time required for the bleeding to intensify.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.dynamiteEnabled: Toggles the recipes of the Dynamites, requires reload.
Enables the Impact Dynamite recipe, requires reload.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.orbsEnabled.too: Toggles the recipes for the orbs, requires reload.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.explosionProofI:
When set to "SOME",
Set specific items to be explosion proof using the #hacksawed:explosion_proof tag
hacksawed.midnightconfig.explosionProofB: Blast Protection Items are Immune to Explosions

Makes all items with blast protection immune to explosions.
When true, applies regardless of the state of blast proof items
When set to "SOME",
Set specific items to be fire proof using the #hacksawed:fire_proof tag
hacksawed.midnightconfig.fireProofFirePr: Fire Protection Items are Immune to Fire

Makes all items with fire protection immune to fire/lava.
When true, applies regardless of the state of fireproof items.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.extendWaterRegi: Farmland can be Hydrated from Water Below
When having an echo shard in your inventory,
there is a chance they ring out emitting vibrations
hacksawed.midnightconfig.blocksReleaseSp: When mining a block without the correct tool, the block will emit sparks
hacksawed.midnightconfig.iceAndSnowDontM: Ice and Snow don't Melt in Cold Biomes
hacksawed.midnightconfig.moreEndermanSaf: By default, this only adds the Dragon Head, however, others can be added using the #hacksawed:enderman_safe tag.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.sneakSweetBerri: Players Sneak through Sweet Berry Bushes Without Harm
hacksawed.midnightconfig.bundleChanges.t: Makes items stored in bundles (especially unstackables) not take up more space then specified below.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.copperGrateFall: Small Entities Fall Through Copper Grates
This value is found by taking the average of all 3 sides.
hacksawed.midnightconfig.drowningDrops.t: This is controlled by the loot table under minecraft:entities/drown/[entity]
